title: Vertex AI - Search for resource metadata in Data Catalog
abstract:
# Vertex AI - Search for resource metadata in Data Catalog
**    Preview     ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
Data Catalog, a Dataplex feature, catalogs metadata from Vertex AI Feature Store resources. Using the metadata search capability of Dataplex, you can discover these resources and view their metadata. For more information about the Data Catalog metadata search capability, see [Search and view data assets with Data Catalog](/data-catalog/docs/how-to/search) .
content:
## Vertex AI Feature Store resources in Data Catalog
Data Catalog lets you discover Google Cloud resources as data assets. The following Vertex AI Feature Store resources are categorized as as data types in the Dataplex search filter:
- `FeatureOnlineStore`
- `FeatureView` **Note:** If your project name contains `:` , Dataplex doesn't catalog `FeatureView` and `Feature` resources created in the project.
- `FeatureGroup`
Note that `Feature` is not listed as a data type in the search filters. However, you can view the list of features and feature metadata by viewing the metadata of the parent feature groups.
## IAM permissions required
Using the Dataplex search, you can view Vertex AI Feature Store resources if you have the IAM permissions to view those Vertex AI Feature Store resources in your Google Cloud project. You don't need additional permissions for viewing the resource metadata in Data Catalog.
**Note:** If you have the permission to view a feature group, you can view the features, including feature metadata, within that feature group using Data Catalog.
## View metadata for an online store
To search for a [FeatureOnlineStore](/vertex-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.featureOnlineStores#resource:-featureOnlineStore) resource, follow these steps:
- To launch a Dataplex search query in the Google Cloud console, go to the **Dataplex Search** page. [Go to Dataplex Search](https://console.cloud.google.com/dataplex) 
- Use the following **Filters** to define your search parameters:- **Projects** : Click **Add project** to search for and select a specific project.
- **Data types** : Select **FeatureOnlineStore** .You can also define your query in the search field. To learn how to define your search query in Data Catalog, see [Data Catalog search syntax](/data-catalog/docs/how-to/search-reference) .
- To view the resource metadata, in the filtered list of data assets, click the name of the online store instance.
## View metadata for a feature view
To search for a [FeatureView](/vertex-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.featureOnlineStores.featureViews#resource:-featureView) resource, follow these steps:
- To launch a Dataplex search query in the Google Cloud console, go to the **Dataplex Search** page. [Go to Dataplex Search](https://console.cloud.google.com/dataplex) 
- Use the following **Filters** to define your search parameters:- **Projects** : Click **Add project** to search for and select a specific project.
- **Data types** : Select **FeatureView** .You can also define your query in the search field. To learn how to define your search query in Data Catalog, see [Data Catalog search syntax](/data-catalog/docs/how-to/search-reference) .
- To view the resource metadata, in the filtered list of data assets, click the name of the feature view.
## View metadata for a feature group
To search for a [FeatureGroup](/vertex-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.featureGroups#resource:-featuregroup) resource, follow these steps:
- To launch a Dataplex search query in the Google Cloud console, go to the **Dataplex Search** page. [Go to Dataplex Search](https://console.cloud.google.com/dataplex) 
- Use the following **Filters** to define your search parameters:- **Projects** : Click **Add project** to search for and select a specific project.
- **Data types** : Select **FeatureGroup** .You can also define your query in the search field. To learn how to define your search query in Data Catalog, see [Data Catalog search syntax](/data-catalog/docs/how-to/search-reference) .
- To view the resource metadata, in the filtered list of data assets, click the name of the feature group.
## View metadata for features within a feature group
To view the list of [Feature](/vertex-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.featureGroups.features#resource:-feature) resources and their metadata within a feature group, follow these steps:
- To launch a Dataplex search query in the Google Cloud console, go to the **Dataplex Search** page. [Go to Dataplex Search](https://console.cloud.google.com/dataplex) 
- Use the following **Filters** to define your search parameters:- **Projects** : Click **Add project** to search for and select a specific project.
- **Data types** : Select **FeatureGroup** .You can also define your query in the search field. To learn how to define your search query in Data Catalog, see [Data Catalog search syntax](/data-catalog/docs/how-to/search-reference) .
- In the filtered list of data assets, click the name of the parent feature group containing the features.
- To view the list of features and feature metadata within the feature group, click **Schema** .
## What's next
- Learn how to [view a list of all data sync operations executed for a feature view](/vertex-ai/docs/featurestore/latest/list-data-syncs) .
- Learn more about [Data Catalog](/data-catalog/docs/concepts/overview) .
